programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: After the civil war, a hell-bent Confederate Army Officer and his sons rob a Union Caravan carrying a fortune, killing every man and beast in the process. They hide the money in an empty coffin and hire a woman to pose as a widow to a dead officer to make it look official. Now they must con and fight their way across the west through thousands of cavalry, lawmen, bounty hunters, and Indians to make their escape.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit lives in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden with his three sisters. Their joyful lives are interrupted by the arrival of Thomas, Mr. McGregor's nephew, who wants to drive Peter away.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: A young girl hailing from an affluent family embarks on a quest for true love to dispel a curse that has pervaded her family.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Fun With Dick and Jane
programme.desc: When Dick's employer goes bankrupt, he and his wife, Jane, go broke and look for ways to make ends meet. Eventually, they resort to crime and decide to rob a crooked CEO to get their money back.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Monica, a schoolteacher, and Steve, a photographer, have been deeply in love for over two years now. However, their impulsive natures often push their fragile relationship into an on-and-off cycle.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore believe that Dave is going to propose to his girlfriend, Samantha, in Miami. In a bid to retain their place in Dave's life, the three set out to stop him.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Percy Jones, a proud African American man, gets the shock of his life when he learns that his daughter Theresa's fiance is a Caucasian man.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: After a night of wild partying, Jack and Joy, two strangers, awake and find they have married each other. Things get complicated when Jack wins a huge jackpot with Joy's quarter, and they must stay together for six months to get money.

programme.title: Firehouse Dog
programme.desc: Rexxx, a top Hollywood canine, gets lost and finds himself in a warehouse. He slowly realises his capabilities as a firehouse dog and befriends a young child to revamp the fire station.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark, Bridget meets a handsome stranger, Jack. Soon, Bridget finds out that she is pregnant but is unsure about the identity of the father.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man discovers that the woman he is dating is a superhero and decides to break up with her. However, things do not go as he planned when she uses her powers to turn his life into a nightmare.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man discovers that the woman he is dating is a superhero and decides to break up with her. However, things do not go as he planned when she uses her powers to turn his life into a nightmare.

programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: After suffering from memory loss, a soldier returns to his former profession as a barber and attempts to escape persecution by the military forces.

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couple's life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their baby's arrival, Marley completes their family.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggie's death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.
